name: Happy Winter Match 3
description:
Looking for an addictively sweet match 3 game? Try Happy Winter. It is free online puzzle adventure.  Match three or more items of the same type and earn score with matching combinations.
Happy Winter Match 3 is ready for mobile and has standalone Android version - download it on Google Play. Free and fun.

It’s simple, but attractive and fun to play. My first project. I made it on Phaser.io framework (Phaser 2.9 CE edition)

Features
• Christmas theme: snowflakes, giftboxes and Santa on Start Screen
• Multi-language - 8 languages in settings
• Music and sound can be tuned in settings
• Infinite game mode (till gameover
